reviewText: I gave this 3 stars only because I ordered it as a quadruple feature but I wasn't familiar with more than one of the movies ("taking of Pelham 123") although I am a huge denzel fan, so I'm sure I won't be disappointed with the other films.
Great movies - all four of them.  Fantastic price!  BUT no subtitles including none for hearing impaired.

Enjoyed watching "Devil in a Blue Dress" again.
Watched "The Taking of Pelham 123" and it was a suspenseful ride.
This collection was chosen not only for Denzel Washington's performances, but also for the story content of each movie. A must for all Denzel Washington fams.
very pleased
Awesome movies at a great price
thank you...love denzel washington movies...

FOUR DENZEL WASHINGTON MOVIES IN ONE PACKAGE!!  What a FIND!!!  I had only been looking for "The Devil in a Blue Dress" and, low and behold, the "Leading Men" collection popped up.  Well, I hope that Amazon.com has more 4-film Leading Men" collections for me to search through.  I would recommend this film package to anyone who has a favorite actor or actress that they follow.  It is a great way to add to your collection.  While I will admit that I already had a dvd of "Philadelphia", I was delighted to get "Glory", "Taking of Pelham 123" and "Philadelphia"  (again) when I was only searching for "The Devil in a Blue Dress". One question, though.  Why are the invoices missing in most of my dvd packages?  As a new Amazon.com customer (and fairly new at using the computer) am I doing something wrong?
Bought it just for "Devil In A Blue Dress", so two other quality movies thrown in was a big bonus.
I love the set!! Really got it for Devil in a Blue Dress! Plus, I love Denzel Washington!!!
Great gift for my brother.  He only seen one of the four.  Thanks.  :)
Great buy! Love it!
Plus, I was only looking for one of the movies but got an additional 3... Love it!!
so far so good
It was a gift for my uncle,something that I heard him talk about and he enjoyed it and I was satisfied.

Devil in a Blue Dress was Walter Mosely's first detective novel and the movie adaptation Denzel Washington and Jennifer Beals is fantastic. The other films are good as well but I bought the set for that particular film.
good movie a lot of drama
PHENOMENAL, MAGNIFICENT, EXCELLENT Actor!!!!
Nice collection of Denzel Washington's movies - all in one case!

Wow! ...Perfect. Viewer satisfaction: anxiety, drama and/or good action bubbling in every film. Denzel Washington & Co-stars will keep you so overjoyed that you ever purchased this four film fantasy!  Pop the corn & grab the chips & sodas--This is one full evening  of movie delight.
Great condition came in good timing very satified, thank you!!
DELIVERED WITHIN A FEW DAYS...thank you
Excellent
